summary: Reg, did you know that Barty and Antonin got together? Can you prep Barty and go back to being his best friend?
question: Reg, did you know that Barty and Antonin got together? Can you prep Barty and go back to being his best friend?
answer:
Regulus: No, I didn’t know…

Regulus: … So they’re together? Already? Wow. That’s… that’s great…. I’ll have to tell Barty how happy I am for him. *Sighs sadly*

summary:
Gryffindor: Ravenclaw, what word has the most letters in it?
Ravenclaw: The longest word in any of the major English language...
body:
Gryffindor: Ravenclaw, what word has the most letters in it?

Ravenclaw: The longest word in any of the major English language dictionaries is pneumonoultramicroscopicsilicovolcanoconiosis, a word that refers to a lung disease contracted from the inhalation of very fine silica particles, specifically from a volcano. Medically, it is the same silicosis.

Gryffindor: … It was mailbox.

tags: fantastic beasts and where to find them
summary: I'll do one of these again
body:
I’ll do one of these again

So yeah I realized some of my beloved fandoms don’t show up enough on my dash so if you post/reblog any of the following PLEASE like or reblog and I will check you out!

  • Stranger things & cast
  • Harry potter
  • Fantastic beasts
  • Eddie Redmayne
  • Emma Watson
  • Martin Freeman/Benedict Cumberbatch
  • Book recs!!!
  • Anything literature related really
  • Chaos walking
  • BBC sherlock / classic sherlock holmes
  • Doctor Who & cast!!
  • LOTR
  • Tuntematon sotilas
  • RDJ

FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

tags: And just to make it clear - the actors that played these roles were outstanding
I have no issue with them
summary: growing up is realising that everyone in the hp movies is way older than they’re meant to be like when i was seven anything over...
body:
growing up is realising that everyone in the hp movies is way older than they’re meant to be

like when i was seven anything over twenty was just indistinguishably Adult, and now fifteen years later i’m just sitting here thinking ‘remus, sirius, and snape were in their thirties, you know’

summary: I recently introduced harry potter to my 7-year-old cousin and her reaction upon seeing voldemort in the goblet of fire was word...
body:
I recently introduced harry potter to my 7-year-old cousin and her reaction upon seeing voldemort in the goblet of fire was word by word: ‘why doesn’t he have a nose though?’

I love that kid so much.

summary:
Sirius: so you're proposing to Evans? Like really proposing?
James: I have to! Or she's going to do it before me!! It has to be...
body:
Sirius: so you’re proposing to Evans? Like really proposing?

James: I have to! Or she’s going to do it before me!! It has to be tonight.

Remus: okay, so do you have a ring?

James: no buy t I did but a cat costume, because you know, she loves cats so!

Remus: you bought a cat costume before you bought the ring…… You really toe the line between sweetness and insanity, you know that right?

Sirius: yeah, that’s kind of his sweet spot.

James: listen to my meow. I’ve been practicing it. *Meows and licks the back of his hand*

Sirius: that was really good mate, really good.

Remus: I need to find new friends.

Harry: Er-well-ghosts are...
body:
Snape: Let us ask Potter how we would tell the difference between an Inferius and a ghost.

Harry: Er-well-ghosts are transparent-

Slytherdor & Horned Serpent § 18 § Leo

tags: i will never understand how nspae sympathizers
can just brush off the bad stuff he's done because he loved lily
or ultimately fought for the good side
and that somehow erases the bad stuff he's done and continued to do
summary:
To address some points: 
1. I used “get his dick wet” because that’s my kind of humour and I’m not sorry if you don’t find it...
caption:
To address some points:
1. I used “get his dick wet” because that’s my kind of humour and I’m not sorry if you don’t find it funny
2. It’s also my blog so I talk however I want, as long as I know I’m not harming anyone
3. What that man felt for Lily was not love, it was obsession. He begged Voldemort to keep Lily safe. Only Lily, not James or Harry.
Idk about you but love means wanting the other person to be happy regardless of your own happiness. It means that you give yourself to the other person and you are willing to give more than you take. This also means you must already be a whole person by yourself and thus you shouldn’t expect the person you love to fill in some “missing piece” within you.
Snape did not care about her happiness. Had Lily lived, she would have been miserable with James and Harry dead. Say that Snape does end up “caring” for her, what do you think would happen when she learns that Snape asked Voldemort to spare only her and not James or Harry?
4. Snape’s literal motivation for fighting for the Light is because he was vindictive and wanted revenge on Voldemort for killing Lily. He wanted to find the only person who had a chance of defeating Voldemort, and if that meant fighting for the Light, he would do it.
Sure, he’s loyal to Dumbledore, but while some of it may be respect, he also owes Dumbledore hella for saving his life
5. Alright, asshole and abuser aren’t synonyms, but both adjectives DO describe Severus Snape.
I know this has been cited many times, but let’s talk about Neville Longbottom. This kid’s parents were literally tortured into insanity by Bellatrix. He goes to visit them at St. Mungo’s regularly, and can you imagine that trauma? Your parents not being dead but being pretty much as good as? They are literally walking corpses at this point, and he has Bella to thank for that.
But guess what, or who, Neville’s boggart is? Not the crazy Bitch who torture his parents! No, its one of his TEACHERS. Someone who was supposed to nurture him, or at least encourage his improvement, is the thing Neville is the most afraid of! And you can’t tell me it’s just because Neville is a soft boy, because we all know that Severus Snape is a salty man who decided to take out his aggression on a literal child just because “his Lily” would still be alive if Neville was the chosen one.
And if Neville did end up being the chosen one that Voldemort picked, Snape would not have CARED that Neville’s parents died. Nope, as long as it wasnt Lily.
6. You know who else had a terrible childhood? Harry Potter. Both Harry and Snape suffered abuse and neglect and isolation. They had terrible upbringings, and they BOTH suffered greatly because if it.
Sure, Harry made friends, people who gave him hope, almost immediately when he turned 11 and got to Hogwarts.
But guess what? Snape had that too, by the age of 9! Lily was his hope, the one good thing that could help him.
At Hogwarts, she stood up for him, even when he made mistakes. Eventualy, Snape made his decision to take the negativity in his life and turn it into more negativity by joining a genocidal cult bent on killing a group of people that Lily was part of.
Harry well could have become as bitter and cruel as Snape, but Snape could also have made the choice to, I don’t know, not become a Death Eater?

Lmao I’ve reread and analyzed those books multiple times over 12 years. That’s a lot of different mindsets reading one series.

(( I’m @-ing ppl bc I aint no Bitch))
@femsev @eggcats

Edit: apparently my app is going wonky bc I can’t @ ppl

reblog.comment:
To address some points:
1. I used “get his dick wet” because that’s my kind of humour and I’m not sorry if you don’t find it funny
2. It’s also my blog so I talk however I want, as long as I know I’m not harming anyone
3. What that man felt for Lily was not love, it was obsession. He begged Voldemort to keep Lily safe. Only Lily, not James or Harry.
Idk about you but love means wanting the other person to be happy regardless of your own happiness. It means that you give yourself to the other person and you are willing to give more than you take. This also means you must already be a whole person by yourself and thus you shouldn’t expect the person you love to fill in some “missing piece” within you.
Snape did not care about her happiness. Had Lily lived, she would have been miserable with James and Harry dead. Say that Snape does end up “caring” for her, what do you think would happen when she learns that Snape asked Voldemort to spare only her and not James or Harry?
4. Snape’s literal motivation for fighting for the Light is because he was vindictive and wanted revenge on Voldemort for killing Lily. He wanted to find the only person who had a chance of defeating Voldemort, and if that meant fighting for the Light, he would do it.
Sure, he’s loyal to Dumbledore, but while some of it may be respect, he also owes Dumbledore hella for saving his life
5. Alright, asshole and abuser aren’t synonyms, but both adjectives DO describe Severus Snape.
I know this has been cited many times, but let’s talk about Neville Longbottom. This kid’s parents were literally tortured into insanity by Bellatrix. He goes to visit them at St. Mungo’s regularly, and can you imagine that trauma? Your parents not being dead but being pretty much as good as? They are literally walking corpses at this point, and he has Bella to thank for that.
But guess what, or who, Neville’s boggart is? Not the crazy Bitch who torture his parents! No, its one of his TEACHERS. Someone who was supposed to nurture him, or at least encourage his improvement, is the thing Neville is the most afraid of! And you can’t tell me it’s just because Neville is a soft boy, because we all know that Severus Snape is a salty man who decided to take out his aggression on a literal child just because “his Lily” would still be alive if Neville was the chosen one.
And if Neville did end up being the chosen one that Voldemort picked, Snape would not have CARED that Neville’s parents died. Nope, as long as it wasnt Lily.
6. You know who else had a terrible childhood? Harry Potter. Both Harry and Snape suffered abuse and neglect and isolation. They had terrible upbringings, and they BOTH suffered greatly because if it.
Sure, Harry made friends, people who gave him hope, almost immediately when he turned 11 and got to Hogwarts.
But guess what? Snape had that too, by the age of 9! Lily was his hope, the one good thing that could help him.
At Hogwarts, she stood up for him, even when he made mistakes. Eventualy, Snape made his decision to take the negativity in his life and turn it into more negativity by joining a genocidal cult bent on killing a group of people that Lily was part of.
Harry well could have become as bitter and cruel as Snape, but Snape could also have made the choice to, I don’t know, not become a Death Eater?

Lmao I’ve reread and analyzed those books multiple times over 12 years. That’s a lot of different mindsets reading one series.

(( I’m @-ing ppl bc I aint no Bitch))
@femsev @eggcats

Edit: apparently my app is going wonky bc I can’t @ ppl

To address some points:

3. What that man felt for Lily was not love, it was obsession. He begged Voldemort to keep Lily safe. Only Lily, not James or Harry.
Idk about you but love means wanting the other person to be happy regardless of your own happiness. It means that you give yourself to the other person and you are willing to give more than you take. summary:
Ghost.
----

"Desde su muerte, su fantasma se aparece ante mí todos los días".

Realmente odio mis dibujos, pero me gusta pensar...
caption:
Ghost.
—-

“Desde su muerte, su fantasma se aparece ante mí todos los días”.

Realmente odio mis dibujos, pero me gusta pensar en ideas para dibujar.😂

Recordé cierta parte de The cursed child e imaginé algo así. Tengo más ideas, pero mi talento para sacarlas es limitado.
